attributes.action: Ban the employment or use of political advisors and other "Spin Doctors" by all members of parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When I filled in my ballot paper at the last election I don't recall seeing a candiate for the "Daily Mail Party" or other tabloid. A lot of government policy appears to be influenced by the media, when I vote for an MP or a party I expect them to act on their concience or the wishes of their constituents not what the press thinks is the order of the day. Remove these parasites of democracy from politics and make MP's accountable to the voters again. I voted for my local MP not the editor of the Daily Mail, so why does he seem to be running the country.
